p:
The syntheses of designed compounds 4a–h and 8a–f are described in the supplemental data. Their purity was checked by HPLC, 1H and 13C-NMR spectroscopy and mass spectrometry. The ADMET parameters of the synthesised compounds were determined using Discovery Studio v3.1 (Accelrys Inc., San Diego, CA) and SwissADME
15 .
